attributes.action: Review the failed attempt on Turing Law,  that did not make it to final speaking
attributes.background: The speech was filibustered on Friday,  on a law to exempt gay men to need to apply to be pardoned on previous sex offences before the law changed.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/170132
